subject.purpose: Real cross-family curvature stress test: families [62], [63], [64]. Family [56] excluded (stateless geometry adapter, no training dynamics).
subject.notes: Family [62] and [63] lack orbit regularization; lambda_orbit=0.0 represents the no-regularizer boundary case (kappa=0, ZERO sign). Family [64] uses lambda_orbit=0.001 (active regularizer). Family [56] GeoGebra excluded: incompatible schema (no lr or model_config).

predicted.narrative: Family [64] with lambda_orbit=0.001: curvature 1e-5 > 0 (active orbit regularization, stable training confirmed).

observed.notes: 5-epoch stable convergence confirmed. Reconstruction error decreases monotonically.

predicted.narrative: Family [62] MNIST EBM without orbit regularization: lambda_orbit=0 → kappa=0 (boundary case). No orbit restorative force.

observed.notes: 5-epoch stable convergence. Reconstruction error decreases without orbit regularization. ZERO kappa is the unregularized boundary.

predicted.narrative: Family [63] QA-native EBM without orbit regularization: lambda_orbit=0 → kappa=0 (boundary case). QA orbit structure emergent but unregularized.

observed.notes: 5-epoch stable convergence with QA-native generator. Orbit coherence observed without regularization force.

compositions.notes: Monoidal bottleneck: ZERO-curvature MNIST subsystem bottlenecks the stable [64] orbit-reg subsystem. The composed system sits on the stability boundary.
